text: now Britain's most senior military

run under the sea the head of the

avoid the risk of a potentially
catastrophic effect on the economy if
the cables were cut Russia in addition
to new ships and submarines continues to
perfect
both unconventional capabilities and
information warfare and there's a new

crisscross the sea beds can you imagine

potentially catastrophic ly affect both

they were disrupted therefore we must
continue to develop our maritime forces

technology is actually making it easier

but I think it would be more
